examples: The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
The board agreed to sell the company.
The deal was completely open and above board.
Heads will have to roll at board level.
They jump off the diving board into the pool.
words.defineEn: a flat and hard tool made of wood, plastic, paper, etc. that is designed for specific purposes
words.defineVi: một công cụ phẳng và cứng làm bằng gỗ, nhựa, giấy, v.v. được thiết kế cho các mục đích cụ thể

examples: The classroom has rows of chairs for students.
That chair doesn't give.
Our dining table has four chairs around it.
We moved our chairs a little nearer.
He dropped his briefcase on a chair.
words.defineEn: furniture with a back and often four legs that a person can use for sitting
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất có lưng và thường có bốn chân mà một người có thể sử dụng để ngồi

examples: My computer is placed on the desk in the office.
Two computers have gone AWOL from the office.
She can design computer programs like nobody's business.
Does the computer turn itself off?
The new computer is an all-in-one that integrates the monitor, CPU, and speakers into a single unit.
words.defineEn: an electronic device that stores and processes data
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử lưu trữ và xử lý dữ liệu

examples: The classroom is filled with desks, chairs, and a chalkboard.
The teacher placed the books on the desk.
My computer is placed on the desk in the office.
He gave her ticket to the woman at the check-in desk.
The receptionist sat behind the desk, welcoming visitors.
words.defineEn: furniture we use for working, writing, reading, etc. that normally has a flat surface and drawers
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất chúng tôi sử dụng để làm việc, viết, đọc, v.v. thường có bề mặt phẳng và ngăn kéo

examples: Close the door, please.
Which door leads to the yard?
right on cue the door opened
That accident battered up the door of my car.
The driver of the car opened the car door for the passengers.
words.defineEn: the thing we move to enter, exit, or access a place such as a vehicle, building, room, etc.
words.defineVi: thứ chúng ta di chuyển để vào, ra hoặc tiếp cận một địa điểm như xe cộ, tòa nhà, phòng, v.v.

examples: This picture shows my mother as a young woman.
For children, picture books provide a window onto the world.
The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
The book paints a vivid picture of life in the city.
I have a picture frame with a family photo on my desk.
words.defineEn: a visual representation of a scene, person, etc. produced by a camera
words.defineVi: một đại diện trực quan của một cảnh, người, v.v. được tạo ra bởi một máy ảnh

examples: His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
At a family reunion picnic, the buffet table showcased a classic beef plate roast.
This business method takes the risk of failure out of the table.
She set the table with plates and glasses in the dining room.
We set the table with plates and silverware.
words.defineEn: furniture with a usually flat surface on top of one or multiple legs that we can sit at or put things on
words.defineVi: đồ nội thất có bề mặt thường bằng phẳng trên một hoặc nhiều chân mà chúng ta có thể ngồi hoặc đặt đồ vật lên

examples: The plan ran into a brick wall.
Small cracks appeared in the wall.
She decorated the walls of her bedroom with pictures and posters.
He's bouncing off the walls.
The artwork on the wall was a mix of colors and textures.
words.defineEn: an upright structure, usually made of brick, concrete, or stone that is made to divide, protect, or surround a place
words.defineVi: một cấu trúc thẳng đứng, thường được làm bằng gạch, bê tông hoặc đá được tạo ra để phân chia, bảo vệ hoặc bao quanh một nơi

examples: For children, picture books provide a window onto the world.
The closed window blocked out the noise from the street.
The photographs clearly show a broken window.
Two faces appeared at our window.
Language is a window into the world.
words.defineEn: a space in a wall or vehicle that is made of glass and we use to look outside or get some fresh air
words.defineVi: một không gian trong một bức tường hoặc chiếc xe được làm bằng kính và chúng tôi sử dụng để nhìn ra bên ngoài hoặc hít thở không khí trong lành
